alerts.login_required_body: Please sign in to sync with Supabase.
alerts.delete_pot_confirm:
Delete this pot?
This stock can't be restored.

step1.title: Boil the water
step1.description: Fill the pot about halfway and bring it to a boil on high heat.

step2.title: Wash and cut veggies
step2.description: Cut all veggies into bite-size pieces.

step3.title: Pack veggies and simmer
step3.description: Start with tougher veggies, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes on medium heat.

step4.title: Cut protein into bite-size
step4.description: Cut meat, fish, tofu, etc. into manageable pieces.

step5.title: Make the soup
step5.description: Turn off the heat once, then mix hot water with your base (yose/miso/kimchi).

step6.title: Layer in protein
step6.description: Place protein on top of veggies and simmer on low for 10 minutes.

step7.title: Portion and freeze
step7.description: Once cooled, portion into containers or bags and freeze.

tips.tip1: “As soon as you heat it, add the cut veggies in order to save time.”
tips.tip2: “If cutting is a hassle, frozen veggies are a win. You can find them at stores like Gyomu Super.”
tips.tip3: “Stems and roots go on the bottom, leafy greens on top.”
tips.tip4: “Removing chicken skin cuts a lot of fat—great for lean gains.”
tips.tip5: “Add garlic or ginger to boost circulation and rev up metabolism.”
tips.tip6: “Don’t overcook meat—once it boils, turn off the heat and let residual heat finish it.”
tips.tip7: “If you use bags, flatten and remove air → write the date. It prevents drying and thaws faster.”

effects.p1: Muscle gain: High protein and low fat makes it easy to hit your target. Recovery: Leucine supports muscle repair.
effects.p2: Muscle gain: Quality protein helps maintain muscle. Practical: The fat helps you hit calories during bulk.
effects.p8: Muscle gain: Lean protein supports muscle repair. Health: Heme iron and zinc support metabolism and condition.
effects.p9: Muscle gain: Protein and B vitamins support energy production. Health: Iron aids oxygen transport and endurance.
effects.p3: Muscle gain: Low-fat, high-protein helps keep intake high while cutting. Recovery: Easy to digest around training.
effects.p10: Muscle gain: High protein promotes muscle repair. Recovery: Omega-3s (EPA/DHA) support recovery and health.
effects.p4: Muscle gain: Adds plant protein to boost total intake. Health: Calcium and magnesium support bones and nerves.
effects.p6: Muscle gain: Easy high-protein option. Recovery: DHA/EPA reduce inflammation and help recovery.
effects.p7: Muscle gain: Balanced amino acids support muscle protein synthesis. Health: Vitamins and fats support hormones.
effects.v1: Muscle support: Vitamin C and folate aid recovery and metabolism. Health: Fiber supports gut health and absorption.
effects.v3: Muscle support: Low calorie and filling to sustain cutting. Health: Fiber and beta-glucan support the gut.
effects.v4: Muscle support: Iron supports oxygen delivery and training output. Health: Calcium and vitamin K support bones.
effects.v5: Muscle support: Carbs prevent energy dips during training. Health: Sulfur compounds support circulation and metabolism.
effects.v6: Muscle support: Low calorie and filling for fat control. Health: Enzymes and water ease digestion.
effects.v7: Muscle support: Antioxidants help with post-workout stress. Health: Beta-carotene supports immunity and mucosa.
effects.v8: Muscle support: Iron and folate support oxygen use and performance. Health: Vitamin C supports collagen and recovery.
effects.v9: Muscle support: Low energy helps keep meal volume high. Health: Fiber and vitamin D precursor support condition.
effects.v10: Muscle support: Potassium helps fluid balance and condition. Health: Fiber supports the gut.
effects.v11: Muscle support: Aspartic acid supports energy metabolism. Health: Folate and potassium aid fatigue and swelling.
effects.v12: Muscle support: Antioxidants support recovery environment. Health: Lycopene supports cardiovascular condition.
effects.v13: Muscle support: Vitamin C supports connective tissue repair. Health: Antioxidants help manage inflammation.
effects.c2: Performance: Easy-to-digest carbs for pre/post-workout fuel. Practical: Low fat makes PFC tuning easier.
effects.c3: Performance: Main carb source to restore glycogen. Practical: Easy to pair and keep eating consistently.
effects.c4: Performance: Provides carbs and protein together. Health: Rutin supports blood flow condition.
effects.c5: Performance: Slow carbs support long activity. Health: Potassium and fiber aid swelling and gut health.
effects.c6: Performance: Easy to add carbs and protein. Health: Fiber helps stabilize blood sugar and fat control.
effects.c7: Performance: High carbs help maintain training volume. Practical: Easy to scale for bulk or maintenance.

desc.yose: Light soy-based broth that highlights ingredients.
desc.miso: Rich miso flavor with high satisfaction.
desc.kimchi: Capsaicin boosts metabolism and makes rice go down easy.
